name: DIVE (itch) (CNIAngel)
description:
DIVE is an endless diving game. You move your submarine pod out of the way of incoming stalagmites to go as deep as you can.

Made using libGDX

Requires JAVA to be installed (if you play Minecraft you'll be fine).

Current Version: v1.4

[Instructions]

*Title Screen

Left & Right arrows - Make a selection

Down arrow - Confirm your selection

ESC - Quit diving before you even start

F1 - Resize your diving view (the screen)

*Gameplay Screen

Left & Right arrows - Move your submarine pod

ESC - Quit diving

F1 - Resize your diving view (the screen)

*Gameover Screen

Left & Right arrows - Make a selection

Down arrow - Confirm your selection

ESC - Quit diving

F1 - Resize your diving view (the screen)
